text: O vy prorok, koly viryachyy zhinkam (khto pokynuv disbelievers) shchob shukaty prytulku z vamy zastavy do vas shcho vony ne vstanovlyatʹ budʹ-yakykh idoliv krim BOHA, ne vykradayutʹ, ne zdiysnyuyutʹ adyulʹter, ne ubyvayutʹ yikhnikh ditey, ne vyhotovlyayutʹ budʹ-yakyy falsehood, ne ne pidkoryayutʹsya vashym spravedlyvym zamovam, vy budete vyznaty yikhnyu zastavu, ta budete molytysya do BOHA prostyty yikh. BOH Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
